title: A new petition to the Kings most Excellent Majestie The humble petition of the knights, gentry, free-holders, of the county of Yorke, who have subscribed hereto: presented to His Majestie at Yorke, April 30, 1642. Desiring a happy union betwixt the King and the Parliament.
publisher: by R.O. and G.D. for Iohn Frank,
